bundles.name: Mortgage Package
bundles.description: Benefit from a discount on the Home Equity loan with the HSBC Home Loan Package and waiver of Establishment Fee, Valuation Fee and Settlement Fee  for one annual fee of $390.

features.additionalInfo: Ability to transfer in and out of the home loan online

features.additionalValue: Free bpay from your Home Equity Loan

features.additionalInfo: Unlimited free deposits into the home Equity account

features.additionalValue: Linked Visa Debit Card for this Home Loan available

eligibility.additionalValue: This product is only available on the package
eligibility.additionalInfo: 1. To be eligible for HSBC Home Loan Package, you must have minimum borrowings of $150,000 and pay the annual package fee of $390. The package fee will be deducted from the loan proceeds at settlement, and charged to the package home loan on the first business day of the loan anniversary month. Excludes non-resident applications.

fees.name: Establishment Fee
fees.additionalInfo: "When we processes a customers loan application. Waived during campaign"

fees.name: Settlement Fee
fees.additionalInfo: "When a customers loan is first drawn. Waived during campaign"

fees.name: PEXA Electronic Transaction Service Fee
fees.additionalInfo: "When we settle the customers new loan or discharge. The amount the electronic settlement operator charges us, which we will charge to the customer."

fees.name: Valuation Fee
fees.additionalInfo: "When any valuation is required as part of the customers loan application. This is the amount the valuer charges HSBC, which we will then charge the customer. Waived during campaign up to $200"

fees.name: Loan Splitting Fee
fees.additionalInfo: For a fourth loan account or more.

fees.name: Lenders Mortgage Insurance
fees.additionalInfo: For mortgage insured loans and when a customer first draws on their loan. This is the amount the insurer charges us, which we will charge to the customer.

fees.name: Search Fees
fees.additionalInfo: When we conduct searches (e.g. Land Titles Office). This is the amount charged for title searches on the property.

fees.name: Guarantor Preparation Fee
fees.additionalInfo: When there is a guarantor and we prepare a guarantee document

fees.name: Multiple Security Property Fee
fees.additionalInfo: When we prepare each mortgage for the third security or more. Payable in addition to any other security preparation fees.

fees.name: Discharge Fee
fees.additionalInfo: When we discharge the mortgage over the security property

fees.name: Consent / Production of Title Fee
fees.additionalInfo: When we consider a request the customer makes for us to consent to something or where we produce a certificate of title.

fees.name: Loan Variation Fee
fees.additionalInfo: When we agree to vary the customers loan agreement.

fees.name: Home Loan Package Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Payable when the home loan package has been selected, and the customer first draws on the loan, or enter the package through a variation; and annually in advance on the second business day of each settlement anniversary month of their loan. It is payable in addition to the monthly loan repayment.

discounts.additionalInfo: Discounted HSBC Home Loan Package annual fee for eligible Premier customers.

eligibility.additionalInfo: Eligible HSBC Premier or Global Premier customers receive discounts.
